body: @gertcuykens Of course Google can do that easily enough.  But, despite a few of the comments above, I really believe that this is a problem that other people are going to run into.  Google is just running into it first.  I have no sympathy for people saying that this is not a problem, or that it is a problem that only Google will run into.  It is a real problem.  That of course doesn't mean that the solution proposed here is the best approach overall.
